core.model.management

Interface IStatefulModelManager<E,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the model to manage.
    S - the type of the model state's description.
    All Superinterfaces:
    IModelManager<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStatefulModelManager, EcoreModelManager

    public interface IStatefulModelManager<E,S>
extends IModelManager<E>
    an IStatefulModelManager generic interface that defines the basic operations for all stateful model managers.

    A stateful model manager is a manager that keeps track of the model's states throughout its lifecycle. This interface provides access to the managed model's collection of states, specifically to its current state It also provides an API to query and modify the model's collection of states (e.g. access by state description, test by state description, state creation, state addition, states display, etc.)

    It must be implemented by all concrete stateful model manager classes.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima

      Returns the state described by the provided state description of the model managed by this model manager, among the collection of its states (if it exists), otherwise throws NotAValidModelStateException

      void      		 importAndLoadState(java.lang.String path, S description, java.lang.Class<T> stateClass)
      Imports the model located at the provided path, for it to be managed by this model manager, and saves it along with the provided description in the collection of states associated with this model manager's managed model, while setting the provided path as the latter's associated path

      Sets the initial state of this model manager's model as its current state

      Updates the model component of the model state of this model manager's managed model, described by the provided model state description (if it exists), otherwise creates a model state instance from the provided model and model state description, as it is implemented by the provided model state class, and adds it to the collection of states of this model manager's model

      • getStateDescribedBy

        default AbstractModelState<E,S> getStateDescribedBy(S description)
                                             throws NotAValidModelStateException
        Returns the state described by the provided state description of the model managed by this model manager, among the collection of its states (if it exists), otherwise throws NotAValidModelStateException
        Parameters:
        description - the state description to search for in the collection of states of this model manager's model
        Returns:
        the model state of this model manager's managed model, described by the provided state description, if it exists
        Throws:
        NotAValidModelStateException - if this model manager's model has no state described by the provided state description

      • createState

        default <T extends AbstractModelState<E,S>> AbstractModelState<E,S> createState(E model,

                                                                         throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Creates a model state instance from the provided model and model state description, as it is implemented by the provided model state class
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing a model state
        Parameters:
        model - a model defining the model component of the created model state instance
        description - a description defining the description component of the created model state instance
        stateClass - the class creating the model state from the provided model and description components
        Returns:
        a model state instance from the provided model and model state description as it is implemented by the provided model state class
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the provided class implementing the model state cannot be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the components of the provided class implementing the model state cannot be accessed from the scope using this method

      • addState

        default <T extends AbstractModelState<E,S>> boolean addState(E model,
                                                             S description,
                                                             java.lang.Class<T> stateClass)
                                                      throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Creates a model state instance from the provided model and model state description, as it is implemented by the provided model state class, and adds it to the collection of states of this model manager's model
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing a model state
        Parameters:
        model - a model defining the model component of the created model state instance to be added
        description - a description defining the description component of the created model state instance to added
        stateClass - the class creating the model state to be added from the provided model and description components
        Returns:
        true if the created model state has been added successfully to the collection of states of this model manager's managed model, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the provided class implementing the model state cannot be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the components of the provided class implementing the model state cannot be accessed from the scope using this method

      • updateOrAddState

        default <T extends AbstractModelState<E,S>> boolean updateOrAddState(E model,
                                                                     S description,
                                                                     java.lang.Class<T> stateClass)
                                                              throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Updates the model component of the model state of this model manager's managed model, described by the provided model state description (if it exists), otherwise creates a model state instance from the provided model and model state description, as it is implemented by the provided model state class, and adds it to the collection of states of this model manager's model
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing a model state
        Parameters:
        model - a model defining the model component of the model state instance to be updated or created and added to the collection of states of this model manager's managed model
        description - a description defining the description component of the model state instance to be updated or created and added to the collection of states of this model manager's managed model
        stateClass - the class creating the model state to be added from the provided model and description components
        Returns:
        true if the model state described by the provided model state description already exists and its model component has been updated successfully. If no model state described by the provided model state description exists, returns true if the created model state has been added successfully to the collection of states of this model manager's managed model, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the provided class implementing the model state cannot be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the components of the provided class implementing the model state cannot be accessed from the scope using this method

      • saveState

        default <T extends AbstractModelState<E,S>> void saveState(E model,
                                                           S description,
                                                           java.lang.Class<T> stateClass)
                                                    throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Updates or creates the model state instance defined by the provided model and state description components, as it is implemented by the provided model state class, and sets it as this model manager's model current state
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing a model state
        Parameters:
        model - a model defining the model component of the model state instance to be updated/created and set as this model manager's managed model's current state (and therefore as this model manager's managed model)
        description - a description defining the description component of the model state instance to be updated/created and set as this model manager's managed model's current state of this model manager's managed model
        stateClass - the class creating the model state from the provided model and description components
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the provided class implementing the model state cannot be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the components of the provided class implementing the model state cannot be accessed from the scope using this method

      • saveStateAndExport

        default <T extends AbstractModelState<E,S>> void saveStateAndExport(java.lang.String path,
                                                                    E model,
                                                                    S description,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> stateClass)
                                                             throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Saves the the model state instance defined by the provided model and state description components, as it is implemented by the provided model state class, using the saveState() method, and exports the model at the provided path, while setting the provided path as the path associated to the model manager's managed model
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing a model state
        Parameters:
        path - the path at which to export the provided model
        model - a model that defines the model component of the model state instance to be saved, and to be exported at the provided path
        description - a description defining the description component of the model state instance to be saved
        stateClass - the class creating the model state to be saved from the provided model and description components
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the provided class implementing the model state cannot be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the components of the provided class implementing the model state cannot be accessed from the scope using this method

        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing a model state
        Parameters:
        path - the path from which to import the model to be managed by this model manager
        description - a description defining the description component of the model state instance to be associated with the imported model

        Throws:
